description: India-South Africa relations are built on a strong foundation of history: PM @narendramodi at the business meet — PMO India (@PMOIndia) July 8, 2016 South Africa and India: val
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
At India-South Africa Business Meet, shared my thoughts about the need for greater India-SA economic cooperation. 

Gandhi ji & Madiba worked for political freedom, now we must work for economic freedom. Our economic ties must fulfil people’s aspirations. Talked about India’s economic transformation in the last 2 years & highlighted the investment opportunities under 'Make in India' initiative. http://nm-4.com/vgis
